attributes.additional_details:
While trying to manage austerity he has given people ridiculous tax breaks. Dropping higher rates of the well off. Raising 40% threshold.

The pittance he got back from Google.

His plan to sell of RBS shares at a loss.
attributes.background: His management of finances has been farcical and has cost the UK billions.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments. If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
